effect_entries.effect:
Erects a barrier around the user's side of the field that reduces damage from physical attacks by half for five turns.  In double battles, the reduction is 1/3.  Critical hits are not affected by the barrier.

If the user is holding light clay, the barrier lasts for eight turns.

brick break or defog used by an opponent will destroy the barrier.
effect_entries.short_effect: Reduces damage from physical attacks by half.

A wondrous wall of light is put up to

for five turns.

５ターンの　あいだ　ふしぎな　かべで
あいてから　うける　ぶつり　こうげきの
ダメージを　よわめる。

5턴 동안 이상한 장막으로
상대로부터 받는 물리공격의
데미지를 약하게 한다.

Un fabuleux mur de lumière qui réduit les dégâts
causés par les attaques physiques durant cinq
tours.

Eine mysteriöse Wand, die fünf Runden
den Schaden von physischen gegnerischen
Treffern reduziert.

Pared de luz que reduce durante cinco turnos el
daño producido por los ataques físicos.

Innalza una barriera di luce fantastica che riduce
i danni degli attacchi fisici per sé e gli alleati
per cinque turni.

A wondrous wall of light is put up to
reduce damage from physical attacks
for five turns.

５ターンの　あいだ　不思議な　かべで
相手から　受ける　物理攻撃の
ダメージを　弱める。
